alert.note: Alert for Bent; Crowley; Kiowa; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 5:17PM MDT until July 20 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Western Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... Northwestern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 517 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Wild Horse Point to Arlington to 8 miles northeast of Cheraw, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Haswell, Blue Lake, Arlington and John Martin Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
